name: Run Kaypee
description:
A platformer game where the player escapes the loop and returns to his real world.

Kaypee is the main character of the game, who gets sucked into a virtual world and tries to escape by jumping and running through the portals. 

The aim of the game is to get out of the virtual world and reach to his real world there is small chance that the in the end the portal is connected to this real world and other virtual worlds. There is chance to win in 1st level itself when you run through the portals.  

The player has to dodge the obstacles that come on the way to reach the door to the next Portal. Player can jump, crouch , sprint & move left and right to do so.

Made by students of VIT-Bhopal 1st year (CSE with specialization in game technology-game programing).

Fiza Sameer(https://fiza234.itch.io/),

Om Mani Tripathi(https://ommani02.itch.io/),

Shubham Kumbhar(https://shubham1911.itch.io/).
